Physical Crystallography Group - AGM 1999


The
Annual General Meeting
of the


Physical Crystallography Group of the BCA /
Structural Condensed Matter Physics Group of the IOP

will take place during the IUCr Congress in Glasgow

at 12.45 p.m. on Sunday 8th August

in the ALSH Room of the S.E.C.C.

Please send any items for the Agenda to the Secretary of the PCG,

Dr. P.A.Thomas, Department of Physics, University of Warwick, Coventry CV4 7AL,
Tel. 44-1203-523354, Fax. 44-1203-692016, E-mail: phrve@warwick.ac.uk

The Agenda will be published on the PCG World-Wide Web pages no later than 6 weeks before the date of the meeting.

Nominations for the Committee of the Physical Crystallography Group

The following nominations for officers and members of the PCG Committee have been received by the Secretary:

Chairman: Prof. J. Finney (Nom. Dr. S. Kilcoyne; Sec. Dr. C.C.Wilson)

Vice-Chairman: Dr. P.A.Thomas (Nom. Prof. J. L. Finney; Sec. Dr. C.C.Wilson)

Secretary: Dr. C.C.Wilson (Nom. Prof. J. L. Finney; Sec. Prof. W.I.F.David)

Ordinary Member: Dr. S.H.Kilcoyne (Nom. Dr. D.R.Allan; Sec. Dr. M. I. McMahon)

Ordinary Member: Dr. J. K. Cockcroft (Nom. Dr. M.McMahon; Sec. Dr. D.R.Allan)

Any further seconded nominations for the above posts must be received by the PCG Secretary not later than 6 weeks before the AGM i.e. by 27th June 1999.

Pam Thomas
University of Warwick
